Detailed Description

This is a custom implementation of a ctype facet, including German umlaute and also the combining diacritical marks used for old texts.

Please consult some STL documentation for info on the methods.

Here is the best ever unicode table: http://triggertek.com/r/unicode/

Author:
Ulrich Reffle, 2008
